testcase.classname: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Login Functionality
testcase.name: Verify user can log in with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters a valid email..........................................passed And the user enters a valid password........................................passed And the user clicks the login button........................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the dashboard.........................passed

testcase.classname: Address Management for Billing and Shipping
testcase.name: Add/Edit a Billing address and ensure successful update
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard.passed When User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Billing Address page.passed And User fills in the Billing Address fields with valid data................passed And User clicks the Save Address button.....................................passed Then User should see a confirmation message.................................passed

testcase.classname: Address Management for Billing and Shipping
testcase.name: Add/Edit a Shipping address and ensure successful update
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard.passed When User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Shipping Address page.passed And User fills in the Shipping Address fields with valid data...............passed And User clicks the Save Address button.....................................passed Then User should see the confirmation message...............................passed

testcase.classname: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Search Functionality
testcase.name: Search for a valid product and apply random filters
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the search page............................................passed When User searches for a valid product......................................passed And User selects random one from Application Area...........................passed And User selects Best Selling from Default Sorting..........................passed And User selects random Dietary Certification filters.......................passed And User selects random Labels & Marks filters..............................passed And User applies the filters................................................passed Then User should see relevant search results................................passed

testcase.classname: To Check then 1-2 taste Application Add to Cart Functionality
testcase.name: Add a product to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the product listing page.............................passed When User increase the quantity using the plus button.......................passed And User click on the Add to Cart button....................................passed Then User should see a confirmation message with the product name...........passed And the product should be added to the cart.................................passed

testcase.classname: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Log Out Functionality
testcase.name: Verify user can log out with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user logs into the application....................................passed When the user clicks the center not username logout button..................passed Then the user should be redirected to the login page........................passed Given the user logs into the application again..............................passed When the user clicks the side module logout button..........................passed Then the user should be redirected to the again login page..................passed

testcase.classname: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application New Registartion Functionality
testcase.name: Verify user can Registartion with his details
